{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Scope}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=reflection_ts|header=experimental/reflect|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Scope = Object&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Scope}} concept is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} reflects a namespace (including the global namespace), class, enumeration, function, or closure-type (Note: Any such {{tt|T}} that does not reflect the global namespace also satisfies {{tt|ScopeMember}}).
